page.title: 17Surveys-Jobs - Burscough
page.content:
Jobs .... A recent survey was carried out with 35 peolple in Burscough. 22.8% work in the Primary industries. 11.4% work in the Secondary industries. 65.7% work in the Tertiary industries. _______________________________________
26% worked in Burscough 20% worked in Scarisbrick 11% worked in Southport 9% worked in Ormskirk 5% worked in Skelmersdale 5% worked in Warrington 5% worked in Liverpool Others worked in Hindley(near Wigan), and Halsall
and one person worked in Saudi Arabia
